lib.rs exposes close_slot (SPL) and close_slot_sol (SOL) entrypoints

escrow.rs implements close_slot_sol using lamports transfer and sets state to Closed

init_commit_store sets max_entries and reserves Vec capacity

escrow.rs owns the settlement logic and uses transfer_checked
